archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0693
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a compliance manager, I want to ensure vulnerable customer SIM cards don't expire, so they can always call 111

properties.value: Not sure if this requirement impacts Comarch. Cannot 111 calls be made without an active sim card? Are emergency calls even going via OCS? Thava to check whether there is any impact on Comarch.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
